title: It Is The Hand Of God On The Wall,
lyrics:
It is the hand of God on the wall,
It is the hand of God on the wall,
It is the hand of God on the wall
It is the hand of God
That's writing on the wall,
Prodigal Sons and daughters
Come home,
Prodigal Sons and daughters come home,
Prodigal Sons and daughters come home,
It is the hand of God
That's writing on the wall.
